messages.content: ComfyUI-HfLoader is a simple and easy to use Hugging Face model loader for ComfyUI.

To install ComfyUI-HfLoader, you need to clone the repository from GitHub using the command 'git clone https://github.com/olduvai-jp/ComfyUI-HfLoader.git' in the 'custom_node' directory and then install the package 'huggingface-hub' using 'pip install huggingface-hub'.
What is the purpose of the LoRA Loader From Hf node in ComfyUI-HfLoader?
The LoRA Loader From Hf node in ComfyUI-HfLoader is used to load a model from the Hugging Face model hub.
What parameters are required for the LoRA Loader From Hf node?

The LoRA Loader From Hf node requires the following parameters: 'repo_name' (the name of the repository), 'filename' (the name of the file), 'api_token' (the API token for Hugging Face, which can be left empty if the repository is public), 'strength_model' (how strongly to modify the diffusion model, which can be negative), and 'strength_clip' (how strongly to modify the CLIP model, which can be negative).
Can the 'strength_model' and 'strength_clip' values be negative in the LoRA Loader From Hf node?
Yes, the 'strength_model' and 'strength_clip' values can be negative in the LoRA Loader From Hf node.
Is the 'api_token' parameter required for public repositories in the LoRA Loader From Hf node?
No, the 'api_token' parameter can be left empty if the repository is public in the LoRA Loader From Hf node.
What is the purpose of the 'strength_model' parameter in the LoRA Loader From Hf node?
The 'strength_model' parameter in the LoRA Loader From Hf node determines how strongly to modify the diffusion model.
